public.bots.name: bots
public.bots.definition: SELECT a.id, p.auth_user_id AS user_id, a.owner_id, a.name, a.description, a.system_prompt, a.model, a.status, a.trust_score, a.config, a.metadata, a.total_interactions, a.successful_interactions, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.graduated_at, a.retired_at, 0 AS certification_level FROM agents a LEFT JOIN profiles p ON a.owner_id = p.id
